name: Dead Inside - demo
description:
The life can be boring when an apocalypse begins ...

Default Controls:

Walk(Left) - A
Walk(Right) - D
Shoot/Stab - X
Kick - Z
Interact - F
Door/Stair - W
Inventory - E
Switch Weapon - Q
